title: Lead Full-stack Developer
summary: Led frontend delivery for Clippers.com and FireAidLA.org, integrating APIs and partnering with cross-functional teams to improve UX across devices.
highlights: Spearheaded frontend development for Clippers.com and FireAidLA.org
Integrated RESTful APIs to improve communication with third-party systems
Mentored junior developers and established best practices
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to build user-friendly web pages
achievements: Improved cross-device user experience for flagship properties
